name: Hold Me, I'm Cold
description:
You and your family live in a cabin in the woods. There is a snow storm coming and you’ve just used the last of your firewood. Leave your cabin. Chop down trees and collect firewood to keep your family warm. Be sure you collect enough and return home before their fire goes out, and they freeze to death.

"Hold Me, I'm Cold" is a short survival game made using Unity in 7 days for Kindred Community Game Jam #5, where the theme was: "The Fire Mustn't Go Out".

Controls:
WASD or ARROW KEYS - Movement
LMB - Swing Axe
RMB - Make Campfire
Escape - Pause/ Unpause
